summary: fomod for the Immersive monster mod for those that LIKE mod info in the NMM.
descriptionHtml:
fomod for the Immersive monster mod for those that LIKE mod info in the NMM.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35631

...DOH... it\'s NOT working!
A: You already installed the original mod.  Uninstall but DON\'T delete it. Copy the FOMOD folder from this file into that one.  IF there\'s a DATA directory then copy it in there.  If not then copy it into the root of the mod.

Q: How do I do THAT?
A: Basics of computers.  Use winrar, winzip or 7z... which ever you prefer.  Make a temporary folder for the stuff you\'re working with and extract the files IN SEPARATE FOLDERS and go from there.

Basically a CORRECTLY compressed file will look like this on the inside:

Immersive Monster Mod.ZIP:
     Docs (Folder)
          IMMERSIVE MONSTER MOD.TXT
     Fomod (Folder)
          INFO.XML
          SCREENSHOT.PNG
     Meshes (Folder)
     Textures (Folder)
     Scripts (Folder)
     Sounds (Folder)
IMMERSIVE MONSTER MOD.ESM or ESP
IMMERSIVE MONSTER MOD.BSA   if it uses a bsa

Then you just rezip the file up and add it using the mod manager.
author: thorne67
